tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.Orange>Twisted Kittens Cluster — The Laws of Survival</>

<TextStyle.White>Welcome to the Ark, survivor. These are the rules that keep chaos in check. Obey them, or risk the wrath of the wild... and the whiskers. Suggestions are always welcome — your voice matters in the pride.</>

<TextStyle.Violet>Valguero Has Arrived</>
Valguero features rugged mountains, dense forests, treacherous caves, and an underground ocean. Team up or go lone-wolf — just respect the laws of the pride.

<TextStyle.Green>Starter Kits</>
Starter kits are available via the webshop. If you received an in-game starter on entry, you are not eligible for the website starter. See the Shop tab for details.

<TextStyle.White>How to open this screen:</>
PC: Press F1
PS5: Hold Square → highlight the wolf icon → press R2
tab1.text3:
<TextStyle.Violet>Server Notices</>
- Daily restart: 03:00 EST
- Connect your Discord and game account to claim a token connection bonus:
  https://twistedkittensgaming.premiumark.net/news/67145-Tkg-Webshop

<TextStyle.Violet>Common Chat Commands</>
!help — Command list
!balance — Show webshop token balance
!report — Submit admin report
!review — Leave feedback
!dinowipe — Dino wipe schedule
!rules — Display rules
!flag — Flag compliance kit
!die — Kill your survivor
!reset — Teleport to safe location (does not teleport tames)
!discord — Discord invite
!website — Official website
!shop — Admin shop

tab2.text1:
<TextStyle.White>Welcome to the Ark, survivor. These rules are the backbone of the Twisted Whiskers cluster — follow them, report violations, and help the pride thrive. Suggestions are always welcome and will be considered by community vote.</>

<TextStyle.Violet>Territory & Tribal Claims</>
• Each Tribe may claim two bases per map. Base sizes must not cause lag or fence large areas.
• Solo players may have one base per map.
• If a solo player joins a tribe, their solo base must be dismantled and merged into the tribe’s official stronghold.
• Claiming more than the allowed base locations will result in admin action.

<TextStyle.Violet>Building With Balance</>
• Build freely but keep performance and fairness in mind.
• Planning a mega base? Request admin approval before expanding beyond normal limits.
• You may not block: high-resource zones, explorer notes, artifact caves or terminals.
• No structure spam. Taming traps must be cleaned up after use.
tab2.text2:
<TextStyle.Violet>Code of the Wild</>
• No offline breeding — imprinting and care matter.
• No egg theft. Respect other survivors' lineages.
• Harassment is not tolerated. Resolve internal tribe disputes privately — admins are not mediators.

<TextStyle.Violet>The Harsh Truth</>
• Lost a tame or gear? Ark is unforgiving. Admins will not replace gameplay losses. In rare server-error cases, the community may receive token compensation.
• Abandoned creatures left at other players’ bases or on obelisks will be wiped without warning.

<TextStyle.Violet>Disciplinary Path (The Rule of Three)</>
1) First Offense: Verbal warning + 24-hour notice to correct (posted in Discord).
2) Second Offense: Involved structures, tames, or players may be wiped. Failure to correct after the 24-hour window = automatic second offense.
3) Third Offense (within 30 days): Permanent banishment from the cluster.

<TextStyle.Green>Honor the Pride</>
Report violations to admins. Players who support the server and uphold rules will be rewarded with generous gifts and recognition.
tab2.text3:
<TextStyle.Orange>Flag System Rules</>
This server enforces a strict flag schedule. Any tribe with an incorrect or outdated flag during a wipe will be fully wiped on that map. Items, tames, and whole bases may be salvaged and auctioned.

<TextStyle.Green>Normal Players</>
• Must update their tribe's flag before the end of each month.
• Next required flag color announced one week in advance.
• Failure to update before the first wipe wave = tribe wiped on that map, no compensation.

<TextStyle.Green>Subscribed Players</>
• Change flag every 3 months. Schedule notices will be given.
• Cancel subscription and the tribe must follow the Normal Player schedule thereafter.
• If you stop playing and inform admins, we will remove the base; items and tames may be auctioned. Noteworthy bases may be auctioned intact.

<TextStyle.Green>Admins</>
• Admins also must change flags every 3 months.
• Failure to update results in tribe wipe and possible auctioning of items/tames or whole base.
tab2.text4:
<TextStyle.Red>Violations = Tribe Wipe</>
• Any tribe with an incorrect or outdated flag during a wipe will be wiped. No partial wipes. All items and tames are subject to salvage and auction.

<TextStyle.Violet>Flag Color Decisions & Schedules</>
Admins choose all flag colors; no exceptions.

<TextStyle.White>Admin Flag (Valid 180 days — multi-panel)</>
Jan-Jun: Azure / Twilight
Jul-Dec: Blue / Green

<TextStyle.White>Donor Flag (Valid 90 days — multi-panel)</>
Jan-Mar: Purple / Cyan
Apr-Jun: Magenta / Blue
Jul-Sep: Yellow / Baby Blue
Oct-Dec: Red / Navy Blue

<TextStyle.White>Free-To-Play Flag (Valid 30 days)</>
Jan: Blue
Feb: Pink
Mar: Forest Green
Apr: Brick
May: Royal
Jun: Magenta
Jul: Red
Aug: Olive
Sep: Yellow
Oct: Black
Nov: Orange
Dec: Green

tab3.text1:
<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">SERVER SETTINGS</>

<TextStyle.Green>Experience & Combat</>
XP: 1.5x | Alpha Kill XP: 1.33x | Boss XP: 2.5x | Wild Kill XP: 1.25x | Crafting XP: 1.25x

<TextStyle.Green>Taming & Harvest</>
Taming Speed: 5x
Harvest Amount: 2.5x

<TextStyle.Green>Survivor Settings</>
Water Drain: 0.75x | Food Drain: 0.75x | Health Recovery: 2.5x
Player Resistance: 1.25x | Player Damage: 1.25x

<TextStyle.Green>World Mechanics</>
Decay Timer: 3.5x | Structure Resistance: 0x
Time Conversion: 24 in-game hours = 120 real minutes
Map location visibility: Enabled
tab3.text2:
<TextStyle.Violet>Active Mods</>
For the most up-to-date mod list, visit the website or Discord. Mods are reviewed regularly and may be updated or swapped to preserve performance and balance.

<TextStyle.White>Need Admin Help?</>
Admin support is handled in the order received. We are volunteers with jobs and families — please be patient. Apply to help via Discord if you'd like to contribute.
tab3.text3:
For full mod lists, patch notes and change logs visit:
www.twistedkittensgaming.com
Discord: dsc.gg/twistedwhiskers

tab4.text1:
<TextStyle.Orange>Monthly Events</>
• Word of the Month: Guess the secret word to earn free tokens. Announcements are made in Discord and in-game.
• Starter Lotto: Webshop lottery with prizes up to 1000 tokens; higher tiers coming soon.
• Bob Beach Treasure Hunt: Five beach caches per map, refreshed monthly. Rewards may include tames, building materials, and token consumables.
tab4.text2:
<TextStyle.Violet>Performance Tips</>
Improve console and low-end PC performance with our guide:
https://twistedkittensgaming.premiumark.net/news/92130-commands-to-help-console-and-lower-speedperformance-pcs

<TextStyle.Green>Quick Command Reminder</>
!help | !balance | !report | !review | !dinowipe | !rules | !flag | !die | !reset | !discord | !website | !shop
tab4.text3:
<TextStyle.White>Player Shop Directory (Sample Listing)</>
Shop Name: Dragonstone Egg Emporium
Discord: MalachThor
Owner: Dragon Lord
Map: The Island
Location: 65.6, 31.2 (TP: Dragonstone)
Goods: Tames and Eggs
tab4.text4:
<TextStyle.Green>Shop Rules & Consumer Protections</>
• All tame sales must include a saddle.
• Spayed or neutered tames may not be sold by registered shops.
• Registered shops should sell stackable goods in full stacks when applicable.
• Token transactions are admin-enforceable; report issues via in-game !report, Discord, or the website. Include date/time, shop name, location, seller survivor name, and a description of the issue.

Admins will investigate and issue refunds or penalties as necessary.
